website_summaries.verdict: The Pro-Keds Royal Lo grants better mobility around the ankle region than the original high-top Pro-Keds royalty. This comeback model kitted out with a sturdy fabric and reinforced with a rubber toe cap receives a warm reception for its old-school vibe that’s easy to sport with any casual clothing.This throwback style somehow implies that there is more to the world of rubber-soled sporty shoes than the Chuck Taylors. What makes it even more attractive to buyers is its come-on affordable price tag and rich selection of colors.
pros: Many are charmed by the nostalgic appeal of the Pro-Keds Royal Lo
A substantial number of users mention getting affirmations while wearing this low-top
Some think that this model is an interesting alternative to the Converse Chuck Taylors
A broad number of wearers are attracted to its timeless design
Its remastered last delivers comfort benefits to the feet, a few buyers have noted
Its durable canvas is fortified by the double stitches
Keds offers this kick at a very budget-friendly price range
Its retro-styled outsole offers traction, according to some
The canvas cover allows air to circulate within the shoe for a more relaxing feel
Several users state the insole delivers cushioning and a considerable amount of support
cons: At least one buyer comments that part of the sole of the PRO-Keds Royal Lo has started peeling off in only three months
A couple of purchasers say they love many aspects of this shoe except that it gets dirty easily

customer_reviews.title: Better than Converse.
customer_reviews.text: Better than Converse. Seem like better build quality...but does bit much different than Converse in terms of construction, and fitting. I like the look of these better than my converse too...but that's preference. Neither converter or these have great arch support. Fitting is similar to converse to me...but for some reason there is more toe drag with these...the toe area curves up more in converse so you dont feel converse is as big in toes area. In these i feel like i have too much toe room when they are same exact length of converse...if that makes sense...
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I will definitely buy from them again
customer_reviews.text: I started to give one star because when I received my order they had spots on both shoes. I called Amazon who in turn placed me on hold and called Zappos and tied me into the call. Zappos apologized and said it was a possibility a worn return could have gone back out by mistake. They discounted me and expressed me another pair that was perfect as Well as fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: Mike R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, as in the old days!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, always talked about this brand. Retro all the way, back to the 70's . Converse vs Pro Keds, the price difference made Converse a more popular choice, but those who could afford this brand were at a different level. So, I had both to fit in with my friends. Now, about the shoes, great material and workmanship. The sole as before and they fit as expected, will be ordering a white pair soon. Can't wait to get a pair of bell bottom jeans to show up in my 40's class reunion.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Zaez

customer_reviews.title: Fit wide feet, Coolio shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son is 13 and wears a 12 wide so I sized up to a 13 and they fit him perfectly. He loves them and they are so much nicer than his croc's faze he went through. He says they feel better than converse and asked for a pair in other colors.. Score! teens are picky but these are as my teen says "Coolio"
customer_reviews.author: Neeners503

customer_reviews.title: If these came in more colors I'd never buy Chucks again.
customer_reviews.text: Slightly more comfortable, and a bit more interesting than Chucks. I dig the stripe.
customer_reviews.author: Just a guy

customer_reviews.title: Run big
customer_reviews.text: I tried to figure out what my size would be based on reviews...i wear women's size 7, so i got this shoe in mens size 5 and it was still about a size too big, so returning :( but i love them, classic look, the insoles have a bit of cushion, although not much arch support.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Old school look with a rubber grip.
customer_reviews.text: Genuine old school. Too cool. For those who dared to be different and chose the stripes over Cons. I've been stopped on the street several times by people who remembered them or who didn't know what they were. One older dude had tears in his eyes when he saw them.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: like them
customer_reviews.text: sneekers are ok, fit ok, perfect for my foot....no flaws, definitely not seconds...but cost was kind of high, but I guess im kind of usually looking for a cheeper sneeker. Very high quality here....very satisfied, everything...thank you very much...
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Love my Pro-keds
customer_reviews.text: These are men’s shoes and I am a woman, so they don’t fit as nicely as I would like. However, I used to own a pair when I was young, so they are great for nostalgia reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes. Since he's become older he said this is a shoe he can wear all day without having to take them off due to leg pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fell Apart within 2 Months
customer_reviews.text: When I received these shoes, I thought "wow, these look cool", but the build quality caused me to guess that the soles would start to separate in time. That was my expectation, but this occurred weeks after I got the shoes. Mind you, I do not walk much in these shoes, nor do I subject them to brisk activity such as sports or running. I do not feel as though I got any value for my money. $60. I do not recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky From Philly

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing pro keds for years. The sneaker size has never changed. I’m a big fan of these sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Alan J. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker Like the Old days
customer_reviews.text: Like the old days when we were kids. Great product. Shipping a little crazy...

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: Bought for nostalgic reasons was disappointed at sizing but great quality
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Ordered Wrong Size
customer_reviews.text: Too big. Forgot these were mens sneakers. Should have ordered a mens 7.5. Returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and quality
customer_reviews.text: Love these sneakers. Brings me back to my childhood days
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Swartz

customer_reviews.title: Likes them
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking & my Grandson really likes them. They are good value!
customer_reviews.author: Marbo

customer_reviews.title: Great oldies lol
customer_reviews.text: I should have ordered the my current size so if you are size 10 go 10 not 10.5

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: Great, comfortable and elegant shoes for walking and exercising. They fit perfect. I hardly feel them on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: betolstoy

customer_reviews.title: Never size up in these...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered size 12 at first... but the fit was too loose. Sent them back for a size 11.5, now it fits perfect. The return and replacement took only 3 days. These run slightly big so be careful when ordering. Good job tho..

customer_reviews.title: unisex, women if they are for you make sure you order 2 sizes smaller than your regular size

customer_reviews.title: Just like when I was a kid!
customer_reviews.text: I have very bad feet with no arches. There are very few shoes that I can wear without a lot of pain. Pro Keds are one of the shoes I can wear.

customer_reviews.title: The Memories from Gym class.
customer_reviews.text: Old school at it's best I had these 35 Years ago in grade school. That's all my Mom would buy me. NO Pumas or Addidas. I love them just because of the memories they bring me. I actually think they are a little bit more comfortable than the Converse. I got the navy blue. Awesome!!

customer_reviews.title: Fits like converse
customer_reviews.text: I like it. The color is not white but more of a Navajo white which is like a light tan. But overall. I like them.

customer_reviews.title: Pro-Keds > Converse
customer_reviews.text: Seem like the same pair I wore 40 years ago as a teen. I recommend Pro-Keds over Converse any day! Definitely classics!
customer_reviews.author: Mikie 1962

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: They're stylish and comfortable. I get plenty of complements.... You wont regret it!!

customer_reviews.title: I wear a woman's 7 got a man's 5 fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: They fit just fine but I knew this is not a sneaker with support.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They look pretty nice and they fit perfectly. Like the material for the laces since they dont require really tight knots to stay tied. I usually buy Jack Purcell Converse shoes, but these caught my eye and they feel just as good.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I saw and wanted these throw back pro keds. Reminds me of my youth. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DESHAY

customer_reviews.title: Fit and Feel great
customer_reviews.text: I wear them everyday and to the gym. They are just like I remember them back in the 60's

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Loved the old school sneaker was too wide and big so reordered 1/2 size smaller

customer_reviews.title: They said that a woman's 9 shoe size is equal ...
customer_reviews.text: They said that a woman's 9 shoe size is equal to a men's 71/2 not so in this case, the shoes were way too large.
customer_reviews.author: laura caputo

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE MY SNEAKERS THEY AWESOME I WILL BUY MORE

customer_reviews.title: Great transaction
customer_reviews.text: I might get half size smaller next, time, but otherwise I was pleased with my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the retro look. Takes me back to childhood. Just as advertised. Great job...
customer_reviews.author: Rodney McDonald

customer_reviews.title: These skips are overall as described
customer_reviews.text: The only issue with this item Would have to be the toe box. It's a little tight. If I wear a thin sock with it to prevent my feet from sweating it is to tight. So I will avoid the socks as these sneakers are not for winter anyhow.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia carter

customer_reviews.title: Minor defect...Amazon has a rotten return policy
customer_reviews.text: Sent a pair with a minor defect, but all official procedures to return were not made easy to understand, or demanded devices and/or return materials I did not possess. Too annoying. One star

customer_reviews.title: Pro-keds
customer_reviews.text: I love my sneakers they remind me of when I was a child . Back then they were like a pair Jordans are today

customer_reviews.title: Timeless
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Keds about 60 years. These are the best.

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my husband
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my husband! He loves them! For was perfect

customer_reviews.text: Once received, the sneaker looks cheap and poorly design not worth the money... matter fact I only wear it twice then put it away...don't buy it.

customer_reviews.text: Wore these in the early 70’s because Converse was too expensive! So happy to bring back the Pro Keds! My teenage sons laugh but what do they know?

customer_reviews.title: I love the sneaker but I just need a smaller size ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the sneaker but I just need a smaller size a size 7/12 is possible

product_meta.title: Keds Men's Royal Lo Black Shoe, Black, 10.5 M US
product_meta.description: A timeless style gets updated technology in the Pro-Keds Royal Lo Classic Canvas. Durable canvas uppers with a round, reinforced rubber toe. Lace-up closure with flat cotton laces and aluminum eyelets. Breathable fabric linings. Features a molded and cushioned, open cell, foam footbed with added arch and forefoot support. Iconic red and blue PRO-Keds powerstripes at midsole. Remastered last with a gum rubber outsole. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 14 oz Product measurements were taken using size 11.5, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size.
feature_bullets: Durable 12.5 oz Canvas with contrast stitching
Molded footbed with open cell foam for breathability
Red and blue power stripe details with an off-white midsole
